page.title: 07BOYS' GAMES IN NORTH YATE
page.content: The most popular game in our area for the younger boys is{hide and seek. They like hiding and running around. {Football}is the second favourite, especially with the older boys. They also like playing{non_stop cricket, {rounders,}and{volleyball.}Another game the boys like is{offground touch.}This is a bit like{chase,}but when you are off the ground you can't get caught by the person who is "on it".{Red Rover is played by two teams, with up to eight people to a team. One team holds hands facing the other team. A member of the opposite side runs and tries to break through their arms. When it is raining, and everyone has to stay inside, some of the boys like to play {table tennis}in the hall. During the summer,{high-jumping}becomes popular.
